about.title: Introduction
about.description: Takniik is a Startup company that provides media and software solutions to multiple businesses. Tankiik worked on B2B (Business to Business) Model and asked for a business website that must have all the descriptions about the company also requested to use the Black theme as a primary theme and must have the option to manage company blogs and other textual data dynamically for the future flexibility using lightweight frontend library/framework.

about.title: Client's Requirements
about.description: Below are the requirements, that client asked for
list: Need a full-fledged web application to represent the company profile.
Need a Black theme as a primary theme option and plain white will be secondary.
Need Animation work for the buttons, texts, and for components/sections.
Need to be lightweight, and flexible with the heavy assets and animation work..

about.title: Project Solutions
about.description: After understanding the client's requirements and work, I concluded the solutions below for the client as these are the best options to use per the requirements.
list: The best library/framework for the frontend design is React.Js as the client wants lightweight and flexible for future changes.
Framer Motion and React Spring are the libraries used for animation work.
For the deployment, we concluded AWS as the client has a few more applications to deploy on the same server.
